control

Class FileListHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • control.FileListHandler

  • public class FileListHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    The Class FileListHandler is a singleton class, which handles system wide a Vector of InformationContainers to represent a list of the files saved in the cloud with their additional information.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.Vector<InformationContainer> fileList
      The file list.
      private static FileListHandler instance
      The singleton instance.

      • synchronizeCloudStorage

        public java.util.Vector<java.lang.String> synchronizeCloudStorage(java.util.Vector<java.lang.String> cloudFiles)
        Synchronize cloud storage. A function to check if all files in file list are contained in the given Vector.
        Parameters:
        cloudFiles - A Vector with all files in the cloud by their encrypted name.
        Returns:
        A Vector of files missing in the cloud but having a representation in file list.

      • selectByEncryptedName

        public InformationContainer selectByEncryptedName(java.lang.String encryptedName)
        Select by encrypted name. Returns the InformationContainer of file list with given encrypted name.
        Parameters:
        encryptedName - The encrypted name of the selected file.
        Returns:
        The InformationContainer with the given encrypted name.
